member.name: IPropertyEnumTypeList.FindMatchingIndex
member.summary: Compares the specified property value against the enumerated values in a list and returns the matching index.
member.param: A reference to a structure that represents the property value.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the index in the enumerated type list that matches the property value, if any.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyEnumTypeList.GetAt
member.summary: Gets the object at the specified index in the list.
member.param: The index of the object in the list.
A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve through ppv, typically IID_IShellItem.
When this method returns successfully, contains the interface pointer requested in riid. This is typically .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyEnumTypeList.GetConditionAt

summary.para: Gets the condition at the specified index.

member.param: A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve.
When this method returns, contains the address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyEnumTypeList.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of elements in the list.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the number of list elements.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyEnumTypeList
member.summary: Exposes methods that enumerate the possible values for a property.
